title: Bought a new champion and it's not popping up
body: I bought a champion with rp point and while it took away the points to pay for it, it still says that I don't have the champion. I even restarted league and everything, I still don't have the champion and it kinda pissed me off a bit.

replies.body: I looked at your account and wasn't able to find a record of a new champion purchase today. Can you [screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) your purchase history in the client that shows this transaction so I can look into this further?

Oops, I though I was logged into my main account, the account that I purchased the champion on. And the thing is, is that it shows no record of me buying the champion. The only evidence is that I don't have as many rp points as I did before I bought her{{champion:222}} . I asked all of my friends and they said they've never heard of that happening.

Sometimes your RP/IP can fall out of sync and sometimes a purchase attempt can update the balance. I recommend going through your previous transactions and ensuring the number you now see being displayed matches up with your previous purchases. If you see anything out of place, feel free to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can investigate further.

Let me know if you have any questions about this.
Okay, thank you for your time :)
